attributes.action: To stop face masks being mandatory in schools, public transport, shops, gyms
attributes.additional_details: Reason why we want this to happen is the amount of harassment people get for not wearing masks and multiple times people in shops, schools, public transport services, gyms, airlines and airport security have violated the 2010 equality act and article 6 on the Nuremberg code (human rights) and article 61 magna carta and there has been no risk assessment shown to the public about masks by the government and no scientific evidence that show that masks work has been provided by UK government
attributes.background: To stop face mask being mandatory in shops, schools, public transport, gyms, plane and airports and public places and for equal treatment for those who don't wear masks in society
